CustomField.description: Retail customer - If 'Contact Person Phone' not null, show 'Contact Person Phone'. - If 'Contact Person Phone' is null, show mobile in customer. Commercial - If 'Contact Person Phone' not null, show 'Contact Person Phone'. - If 'Contact Person Phone' is null, show blank.
CustomField.formula: if( OR(TEXT(Account.Account_Type__c) = 'Retail Customer', Text(Account.Account_Type__c) = 'Retail Prospect'),if(Mobile_Condition__c = '',Account.Mobile_Number_PE__c,Mobile_Condition__c), Mobile_Condition__c )
CustomField.label: SMS Mobile Endpoint
